"The Mighty Peking Man" or "Goliathon" is a 1977 Hong Kong adventure monster movie produced by Shaw Brothers Studio to capitalize on the attemped surrounding the King Kong (1976). The film was originally released in the US in March 19, 1980 as "Goliathon" dubbed by Les Filmes Jacques Willemetz-Paris. as the critics entry for "Infra-Man".
